sentences.english: Sihanouk, now 88 and the king father, resides in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 现年88岁的西哈努克国王仍居住在北京。

sentences.english: Sihamoni arrived in Beijing on January 1 to see his parents Mr. and Mrs. Sihanouk.
sentences.chinese: 西哈莫尼于1日来京探望父母西哈努克夫妇。
